detail_desc: Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps, a racer back, elasticated ribbing at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Top in soft cotton jersey with long sleeves, a chest pocket and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Jersey vest top in a linen and viscose blend with a deep neckline at the back.
Rounded collar in a cotton weave embellished with glass beads and embroidery. Fastening with a spherical button at the front.
Balconette bra in lace and mesh with underwired, lightly padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Playsuit in soft viscose jersey in a double layer at the top with narrow shoulder straps, an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Shorts in stretch twill with a zip fly and button at the waist, front and back pockets, and raw-edge hems.
Velour bracelet with a snap-on strap and soft toy head with embroidered details and appliqués. Size 3.5x20 cm.
Long, straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with a press-stud fastening, welt front pockets with a flap and long sleeves with high slits at the cuffs. Lined.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder top in soft cotton jersey with short sleeves.
Protective plastic case with a lid for AirPods.
Double-layered jersey hats in a soft cotton blend. One with a print motif and one in a solid colour.
Calf-length skirt in soft cotton poplin. High waist with covered elastication and a small frill trim, and gathered tiers for added volume. Unlined.
Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit, leggings and hat in soft organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch. Leggings with wide foldover ribbing at the waist.
Scarf in an airy linen weave with fringes on the short sides.
5-pocket ankle-length trousers in stretch cotton corduroy with a high waist, zip fly and button, and straight legs with raw-edge hems.
Sandals with narrow straps and a round buckle over the foot, and long straps that tie around the ankles. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Heel 5 cm.
Set with a long-sleeved top in cotton jersey and skirt in textured-knit cotton. Top with an all-over print. Skirt with flounce-trimmed straps.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist and raw-edge sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Swim shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh shoulder straps and a narrow racer back with elastic straps.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft jersey.

Shell trousers in windproof, breathable functional fabric with taped seams and waterproof zips. Adjustable hook and loop tab at the sides, a zip fly with press-studs, and zipped side pockets. Shaped legs with seams at the knees for optimum mobility and reinforced hems with snow flaps and reinforced elastication. Unlined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with long sleeves.
Slippers in a soft jacquard knit with a high shaft and hook and loop fastening at the back. Pile linings and soft, knitted soles with anti-slip protectors.
Oversized jumper in a wool knit with a V-neck front and back, low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves. Straight, ribbed hem with slits in the sides and ribbed cuffs. Longer at the back.

Blouse in airy, patterned chiffon crêpe with an opening and button at the back of the neck and smocked seam under the bust. Long sleeves with smocking at the elbows and elasticated cuffs. Partly lined in jersey.
Short, padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and a drawstring at the sides of the hem. Lined.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a ribbed collar, button placket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
5-pocket, high-waisted, ankle-length jeans in washed cotton denim with hard-worn details. Sewn-on belt with metal rings, a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener, and straight legs.

Set with a T-shirt and joggers in soft cotton. T-shirt in soft, printed jersey. Joggers in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.

Long, finely-pleated dress in softly draping jersey. Round neckline with narrow, covered elastication and an open back with adjustable lacing. Seam at the waist with narrow, covered elastication and small, decorative frills. Gently flared skirt with a high slit in one side. Unlined.
Heart-shaped backpack in sturdy imitation leather with a quilted front. Handle and a zip with a heart-shaped tab at the top, and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Lined. Size approx. 7x22x22 cm.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey with a deep V-neck at the back with crossover straps.
Shoulder bag in sturdy imitation leather with a suede flap, metal fastener and metal shoulder strap. Imitation leather inner compartment and a fabric lining. Size approx. 7.5x13.5x23 cm.
Short, fitted dress in smocked cotton jersey with a square neckline and a small frill trim at the top. Short sleeves with broderie anglaise, and a small frill trim at the hem. Unlined.
Sunglasses with transparent plastic frames and UV-protective, polarised lenses.
Shirt in a stretch cotton weave with a classic button front, yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Short, ribbed vest top with decorative buttons down the front.
Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist and straight legs.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif and embroidered appliqué. Jersey-lined hood with a decorative drawstring, a zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Marled joggers in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Wide waistband for a more comfortable fit.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave with a high, elasticated paper bag waist, detachable tie belt, diagonal side pockets and tapered legs.

Set with a fleece-lined hat and pair of fleece-lined mittens in soft faux fur. Hat with ears on top and a hook and a loop fastening under the chin. Mittens with elastication at the cuffs. Size 6M without thumbs.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, fitted dress in jersey crêpe with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a draped, wrapover front with a knot detail at one side.
Sleeveless, knee-length dress in jersey crêpe with a small stand-up collar and concealed zip at the back. Wide, detachable tie belt at the waist. Jersey lining.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a washed look. Roll-edged chest pocket and roll edges around the neckline and sleeves.
Short dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a round neck, long puff sleeves, concealed zip at the back and seam at the waist. Unlined.
Swimming trunks with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted mirrored lenses.
Slightly longer, straight-cut T-shirt in crushed velvet with gently dropped shoulders.
Long-sleeved Henley top in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with a button placket and small fabric appliqué at the hem.
Sleeveless body in jersey containing glittery threads. Deep V-neck at the front and press-studs at the crotch.
One satin scrunchie and one chiffon scrunchie, both with a large, sewn-on bow.
Polo-neck jumper in soft, rib-knit cashmere. Slightly longer, straight style with low dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Scarf in a soft cashmere knit. Size 60x180 cm.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and short slits in the sides.
Knee-high fishnet socks with elasticated tops.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in a soft wool blend with a hood, buttons down the front and trimmed edges. Jersey lining.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Socks in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend. Supplied in a box.
Metal chain necklace with three round metal pendants in different designs and sizes. Adjustable length approx. 50-56 cm.
Shirt in airy cotton poplin with a grandad collar, visible buttons at the top and concealed buttons to the hem. Chest pocket and long sleeves with a tab and button.
Fully-fashioned trainers with plastic details, elasticated lacing and loops front and back. Mesh insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Calf-length dress in crinkled fabric with a V-neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and an elasticated seam with a drawstring at the waist. Unlined.

Padded all-in-one suit in wind- and water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, fleece-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zip down the front that continues part-way down one leg, a zipped chest pocket and elastication at the back, cuffs and hems. Reinforced at the knees and back, reinforced elastic straps at the hems and reflective details. Fleece lining. The all-in-one suit has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Trousers in cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, fly with a button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Trousers in stretch twill with a high, elasticated waist and a concealed zip in one side. Fake welt pockets at the back and slim legs with creases and short slits at the hems.
Jumper in a soft pointelle knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Skirt in washed stretch denim with contrasting colour seams, a zip fly and button and back pockets.

prod_name: W ED Elin denim skirt EQ
detail_desc: 5-pocket, short skirt in washed denim with a button fly and raw-edge hem.
Spacious, lightly padded wash bag in patterned satin with a zip at the top and handle at one side. Lined. Size 20x28 cm.
V-neck dress in a viscose weave with covered buttons down the front, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and an inset lace band at the waist.
Vest tops in soft organic cotton jersey.

Short blouse in an airy, textured weave with a narrow, rounded collar and ties at the neck. Buttons down the front, a lace frill at the top that continues over the shoulders, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs with a scalloped lace trim.
Soft velour fancy dress hat in the shape of a lion with padding, embroidery, sewn-on ears and a faux fur front section. Hook and loop fastener at the front. Lined. Polyester padding.
Ankle-length dress in soft jersey with a round, slightly wider neckline and wide shoulder straps. Relaxed fit with gathered tiers for added width and soft draping. Unlined.
